title: Africa: The Serengeti
overview: The equation of life on the Serengeti is simple: carnivores eat plants, herbivores eat carnivores.  Africa: The Serengeti takes you on an extraordinary journey to view a spectacle few humans have ever witnessed. The Great Migration. Journey with more than two million wildebeests, zebras and antelopes in their annual 500 mile trek across the Serengeti plains
